EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-01-18-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Jacksonville.ES-2018-02-13.EMAIL - ReInvi
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited - Exclusive Event at TPC Sawgrass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We'd like to cordially invite you to an exclusive event with our friends at Cisco in Jacksonville for a luncheon at the club house followed by an afternoon on the greens at TPC Sawgrass.
TPC Sawgrass is the No. 9-ranked resort golf course in the US and the top-ranked golf course in Florida. After lunch at the club house, we'll be teeing off on a must play course for golf fans around the world, Dye Valley.
Reserve your tee-time, RSVP today <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>.
When: Wednesday, February 21st, 2018 - 11:00 AM Where: TPC Sawgrass 110 Championship Way Ponte Vedra Beach, FL 32082
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-jacksonville/]]>
- Your Friends at Turbonomic
